alert.note: Alert for Grady; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 11:16PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Grady and central Thomas Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 1116 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Thomasville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Thomasville, Boston, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Moncrief, Dillon, Patten, Eason, Merrillville, Dawesville, Pine Park, Newark, Pasco and Beachton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight EDT for south central and southwestern Georgia.
